Question
========

Which of the following characteristics are continuous or discrete stochastic variables? \ I. The speed of a vehicle on a highway. II. The number of accidents last year on a highway.

Answerlist
----------

* I and II are both continuous stochastic variables.
* I is a discrete variable, but II is a continuous one.
* I is a continuous variable, but II is a discrete one.
* I and II are both discrete stochastic variables.

Solution
========
